item.description: From https://udemy.com/course/spring-tutorial-for-beginners/. Section 1. Intro to Spring What is Spring? A: It’s a Dependency Injection Framework. What is DI? What is a dependency?? Dependency Below, the web layer depends on the business layer. The business layer depends on the data layer. Etc.
